mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(#{str}, IFNULL(LPAD(RIGHT(MAX(`username`),5)+1,5,0),'00001')) username FROM t_sys_user WHERE username like concat(#{str}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sys_user(username, password, realname,dept,deptName, role, roleName, sex, phone, creator, createTime) VALUES(#{username}, #{password}, #{realname}, #{dept},#{deptName},#{role}, #{roleName}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{loginUser}, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE t_sys_user SET realname = #{realname}, sex = #{sex}, dept = #{dept}, deptName = #{deptName}, role = #{role}, roleName = #{roleName}, delete_flag = #{delete_flag}, editor = #{loginUser}, editTime = now() WHERE username = #{username}
mapper.delete: UPDATE t_sys_user SET delete_flag = 1, editor = #{loginUser}, editTime = now() WHERE username = #{username}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_sys_user SET password = #{password} WHERE username = #{username}
